definition: (classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: EVERY evening the young Fisherman went out upon the sea, and threw his nets into the water.
sentences.chinese: 每晚，年轻的渔夫都要出海打鱼，将他的网撒进水里。

sentences.english: Instead, the fisherman drew out a copper jar.
sentences.chinese: 渔夫取出来的却是一个铜罐。

sentences.english: During the Eastern Jin Dynasty, there was an old fisherman in Wuling.
sentences.chinese: 东晋年间，武陵有一个老渔夫。

sentences.english: That fisher made friends with a strange fish.
sentences.chinese: 阿谁渔夫与一条怪鱼交上了朋友。

sentences.english: In fact, as Yeats declares, the fisherman does not exist.
sentences.chinese: 实际上如叶芝所说，渔夫并不存在。

sentences.english: A fisherman abandons his big-city life to find himself in the wild.
sentences.chinese: 渔夫放弃了大城市来到了野外生活。

sentences.english: The  fisherman wishes to finish the dish of  reddish fish.
sentences.chinese: 渔夫希望做完那盘略带红色的鱼。

sentences.english: As the boat floated downstream, the fisherman lost his way.
sentences.chinese: 船沿着溪水行驶，老渔夫不知怎么迷了路。

sentences.english: He appropriately opted for Wellington boots and fisherman pants while fishing on the River Dee with the Duchess of Cornwall.
sentences.chinese: 在梯河钓鱼时，王储夫妇选择了渔夫渔妇的装扮。

sentences.english: I had to be as patient as the fisherman for this shot.
sentences.chinese: 为了拍到这张照片，我必须和渔夫一样有耐心。

sentences.english: The fisherman tightens the birds' collars to keep them from swallowing their catches.
sentences.chinese: 渔夫收紧鸬鹚的脖套，防止它们吞下捕捉到的猎物。

sentences.english: The fisherman weighed the fish and it weighed 150 kgs.
sentences.chinese: 那个渔夫称了鱼，鱼重大150千克。

sentences.english: He was a fisherman by trade and resided at Capernaum with his wife and mother-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个渔夫，同他的妻子和岳母一起住在迦百农。

sentences.english: Fishermen and sailors sometimes claim to have seen monsters in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 渔夫和水手们有时声称自己看到过海里的妖怪。
渔夫由于恐惧而颤抖着。

sentences.english: LEEN and the young fisherman DAAN are both members of a local motorbike-club.
sentences.chinese: 利恩和年轻的渔夫但恩都是当地摩托车俱乐部的成员。

definition: person who lives and makes a living on a boat/boatman/boat dweller
variant of 漁網|渔网[yu2 wang3]
